Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma, the vice-captain of this year’s Indian squad, made his T20I debut during the inaugural T20 World Cup held in 2007.
Veteran Pakistan all-rounder Mohammad Hafeez opened the innings for Pakistan in the inaugural ICC T20 World Cup Final.
‘Ageless’ Shoaib Malik captained Pakistan in the inaugural T20 World Cup final against India.
